title: **3 and Out Emergency Trade Pod** Niners QB Options at #3? -- Dolphins Moves -- Eagles Plan
itunes:title: **3 and Out Emergency Trade Pod** Niners QB Options at #3? -- Dolphins Moves -- Eagles Plan
description:
In this episode, John reacts to the Niners trading up with the Dolphins to the #3 pick, which QB they should draft with the pick, how the Dolphins should use their haul of picks over the next several years, and how the Eagles should attack the draft after making a separate first round pick swap with Miami. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
